titles.title: Designating majority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/29/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on April 29, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Elects Mr. Putnam of Florida to the House Committee on Resources.
